name: HahaOya
description:
A game about a monster queen trying to feed her babies without disturbing the local inhabitants. You can switch between the monster form and back, it's a part stealth, part action, part resource management.

#LDJAM33 game that is barely functional! It was a lot of fun but I couldn't really put 100% into time frame due to life issues distracting me all through out the week but here it is please let me know what you think! And thank you for your time!

CONTROLS :

WASD for movement

Space to toggle Monster form

E to interact
